response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the cost and value it brings, I am offering it to you for $120. I trust this price reflects the true worth of the product and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 120}
